description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6sp2","text":"Protocol used in the Mazmanian lab for collecting brain and gut tissues and plasma from mouse for metabolomics. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3rj1d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97qva","text":"Note that any protocol involving animals should be approved by your Institutional Animal Care\nand Use Committee (IACUC) before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"f6jql","text":"The protocols.io team notes that research involving animals and humans must be conducted according to internationally-accepted standards and should always have prior approval from an Institutional Ethics Committee or Board.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4CE36733E6B011EE92B00A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}

related_materials.name: Vacutainer Hemogard Closure Plastic K3-EDTA Tube
Thermo Scientific Pierce Microcentrifuge Tubes, 1.5 mL
Precellys 2mL Soft Tissue Homogenizing Ceramic Beads
Safe-Lock Tubes 2 ml Biopur (preferably packed individually)

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"39j8o","text":"Euthanize the mouse inside a fume hood by decapitation using scissors (or by alternative method approved by your IACUC).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6lu06","text":"Use straight scissors to separate the head from the rest of the body.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9vu22","text":"Use a single-edge razor blade to section the brain tissue in slices of approximately  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":201,"value":"1"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"85pg9","text":"Dissect brain regions of interest according to a reference brain atlas.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1u158","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87s16","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"28pes","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"680oa","text":"For striatum and motor cortex, we use slices from +1.54 mm to +0.10 mm anterior-to-posterior relative to bregma. For substantia nigra, we use slices from -2.70 mm to -3.52 mm relative to bregma. For brainstem, we start at the superior colliculus of the midbrain and cut obliquely to meet the pituitary gland.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e2997","text":"Store samples at   until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7pu5h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cp7fn","text":"For plasma samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"36vg","text":"Separate plasma by centrifugation at   for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5hd44","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"2.500","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5pimr","text":"Transfer plasma to a pre-cooled  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"293720638B0945589441EA7747996660","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Thermo Scientific Pierce Microcentrifuge Tubes, 1.5 mL","rrid":"","sku":"69715","url":"https://www.fishersci.com/shop/products/pierce-microcentrifuge-spin-cups-spin-columns-1/PI69715#","vendor":{"id":95,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.thermofisher.com/us/en/home.html","name":"Thermo Fisher Scientific"}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1v74c","text":"Place the brain in an ice-chilled stainless steel coronal matrix. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7k33j","text":"For brain samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4jden","text":"For gut samples ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3r1a8","text":"Remove the intestine from the duodenum to the rectum. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7odov","text":"Insert the sterilized scissors below the skin to expose the abdominal muscle.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ajhnf","text":"Make another incision through the abdominal muscle to access the internal organs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7s24u","text":"Use forceps, a Boehler bone cutter, and serrated forceps to detach any residual muscle tissue from the posterior and inferior portions of the skull. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ebfej","text":"Weigh samples and record for future reference.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bc95g","text":"Using large scissors and large forceps, make an incision through the abdominal skin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bv3p3","text":"Use a surgical blade or straight scissors to rapidly remove the brain from the skull by severing the proximal end of the spinal cord from the occipital bone of the skull","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2qmuh","text":"At   collect trunk blood in   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cl9r0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"548E18C4C4374737885E59D3EB533F19","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Vacutainer Hemogard Closure Plastic K3-EDTA Tube","rrid":"","sku":"367836","url":"https://www.fishersci.nl/shop/products/vacutainer-hemogard-closure-plastic-k3-edta-tube/15349700","vendor":{"id":1654,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.bdbiosciences.com/en-eu","name":"BD Biosciences"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3dlov","text":"Add samples to   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9avvt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"E50588D9DB9744CF8B3FDE6CEC7E91D5","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Precellys 2mL Soft Tissue Homogenizing Ceramic Beads","rrid":"","sku":"10011152","url":"https://www.caymanchem.com/product/10011152/precellys%C2%AE-2-ml-soft-tissue-homogenizing-ceramic-beads-kit-(ck14)","vendor":{"id":444,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.caymanchem.com/","name":"Cayman Chemical Company"}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6dd11","text":"Snap-freeze on dry ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ip7o","text":"Store samples at   until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bhmqe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fbkp1","text":"Sterilize scissors by spraying with   EtOH.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ltq7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"70","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7m77n","text":"On an ice-chilled dissection tray, dissect desired intestinal samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ct02m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8n3fs","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"vdmg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bd384","text":"For the small intestine, we dissect from 1 cm distal to the stomach to 1 cm proximal to the cecum. For duodenum, we dissect from 2 cm distal to the pyloric sphincter. For ileum, we take from 2 cm proximal to the cecum. For large intestine, we dissect from distal of the cecum to 10 mm proximal to the anus. For distal colon, we dissect 1 cm proximal to the rectum.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"abdn6","text":"To sample contents of small intestine, cecum, and distal colon, remove contents using a 5 mL syringe and 14 G needle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2rcqs","text":"Cut tissue samples into   sections.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5e0gb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":200,"value":"1"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7b2k1","text":"Weigh samples and record for future reference.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"10oit","text":"Add tissue samples to   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bm328","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"E50588D9DB9744CF8B3FDE6CEC7E91D5","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Precellys 2mL Soft Tissue Homogenizing Ceramic Beads","rrid":"","sku":"10011152","url":"https://www.caymanchem.com/product/10011152/precellys%C2%AE-2-ml-soft-tissue-homogenizing-ceramic-beads-kit-(ck14)","vendor":{"id":444,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.caymanchem.com/","name":"Cayman Chemical Company"}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7c17u","text":"Snap-freeze samples on dry ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fadv1","text":"Add tissue content samples to sterile   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8e5e5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"4252ECB9341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Safe-Lock Tubes 2 ml Biopur (preferably packed individually)","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"0030121597","stats":{"total_protocols":2},"url":"https://online-shop.eppendorf.de/DE-de/Spitzen-Reaktionsgefaesse-und-Platten-44512/Reaktionsgefaesse-44515/Eppendorf-Safe-Lock-Tubes-PF-8863.html","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.eppendorf.com","name":"Eppendorf"}}}}}
